active_incidents.title: Some users are unable to search in Slack

notes.body: Affected users should be able to search and see the most optimal results. However, we're still working on this issue. We'll let you know if the situation changes, and we'll follow-up once this issue is resolved.
All affected users should be able to search in Slack. However, some users may not see the most optimal search results. We'll continue to work to resolve this trouble.
At this time, some users may be unable to search for messages and files specifically. We're working to resolve this issue, and we appreciate your patience.
Some users are unable to search in Slack. We're investigating, and we'll follow-up here once we know more. We're sorry for the trouble.
